title: Rigid Consent Enforcement
task: Creates rigid consent enforcement with little flexibility
summary: As a developer, I want ALFRED to enforce strict consent rules for caregiver data sharing, so that user privacy is fully protected.

title: Secure Data Handling in Apps
task: Implements security measures to protect user data in his apps
summary: As a developer, I want to enforce strict privacy controls with authorized data sharing to protect user data securely.

title: Monitor user feedback and settings
task: Monitors user feedback and settings related to app installation
summary: As a developer, I want to forcibly monitor user feedback and app settings continuously, so I can control app deployment and enforce usage.

title: Force app installation without consent
task: Forces installation of essential apps on user devices without consent
summary: As a developer, I want to install apps on users' devices only with user consent or in emergencies, so healthcare features are available without violating privacy.

title: Monitor App Compliance and Usage
task: Monitors system compliance with strict data sharing and notification rules
summary: As a developer, I want to monitor app compliance and usage continuously to enforce strict control and fix issues quickly.

title: Enforce Notification Policy Review
task: Reviews and enforces ALFRED's notification policies
summary: As a developer, I want to enforce strict notification delivery only in emergencies or with user consent override, so urgent alerts are always delivered when needed.
